title: What is a good pick into Urgot?
body:
So I have had a hard time against this champion, both because I think he does a lot of damage and I don't know how to counter him.

Played Xin Zhao top against him and he was just bursting me so hard every time I tried to CS. Towerdove me at lv 11 when I was full HP with his JG and both took like 0 damage(I had armor too).

2nd instance of facing Urgot when I played Tristana bot. Just endless poke from him and Sona to the point I was 3 CS/min.
Try to get 1 CS, lose half HP.

So who is a good pick into Urgot, especially top lane?

replies.body:
{{champion:150}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:104}} {{champion:133}} {{champion:85}} (AD)

Let no one fools you with other suggestions.

The biggest thing to do is dodge his Q and make him fight you nearby your minions, so that his W will target them instead. If you have ways to get back to the correct side after he dashes into you, that also helps.

Teemo can be a strong pick top into him, simply because of his Q. Leona is also a strong pick into him, imo, although you *do* have to be good at her, and know how to play her top (My suggestion is W max then catalyst, Bami's, then Sunfire, take Grasp). Quinn is probably fine as well. Avoid Fiora or anyone else who'd jump around him a lot because it's going to just suck ass, because you'll eat shotguns for the entire match.

1. Wait for him to miss Q
2. Kite his W around minions afterwards
3. Beat his ass
4. GG you win

coming from a M7 Urgot

Teemo

Urgot's W, his biggest source of damage, is treated as a series of auto attacks.

Blinding Dart completely neuters him.
I remember seeing Urgot getting rinsed by Aatrox once, his CC spam screwed him up.

GP can delete his ult with W
Trynda with his R
Quinn has more range
